Module.name: VPDDGEO
Module.comment: is the Pseudo Vertex Position Detector of STAR

Document.Module:
AGECOM GCUNIT GCONST
VPDD,VPBP,VPBO,VPBA,VPBB,VPBX,VFEE,VLEM,VPIP,VPFP,VPFA,VPFB,VPFC,VPBI,VPST,VPSC,VPSA,VPSB,VPSV,VPSW,VRNG,VSEC,VDET,VXST,VCNV,VPMT,VRAD,VPCL,VPCF,VPCV,VPCH,VDTI,IBEM,IBEH,IBEV,IBEW
ybase,ytop,convlength,detangle,strutheight,ydispl
ElecThck,ElecWid,ElecLen,xloc,yloc,zloc,zpos
isec
zpos = vpdg_zposWest
zpos = vpdg_zposEast
ybase= vpdg_IBposYc - (vpdg_IBheight + vpdg_BPthick)/2 ytop = ybase + vpdg_BPthick/2+ vpdg_FPheight + vpdg_FPChght
xloc=(vpdg_BPwidth-vpdg_FPwidth)/2 yloc=ybase+(vpdg_BPthick+vpdg_FPHhght)/2 zloc=(vpdg_BPlength-2*vpdg_FPthick-vpdg_FPHhght)/2
yloc=ytop-vpdg_FPAhght/2 zloc=(vpdg_BPlength - vpdg_FPthick)/2
xloc=(vpdg_FPAwidth+(vpdg_BPwidth-vpdg_FPAwidth-2*vpdg_FPwidth)/2)/2 yloc=(ytop - (vpdg_FPChght+vpdg_FPAhght)/4) zloc=(vpdg_BPlength - vpdg_FPthick)/2
xloc=(vpdg_BPwidth-vpdg_FPwidth)/2 yloc=(ytop-(vpdg_FPChght+vpdg_FPwidth/2)/2) zloc=(vpdg_BPlength - vpdg_FPthick)/2
xloc=(vpdg_BPwidth-vpdg_FPwidth)/2 yloc=(ybase+vpdg_BPthick/2+ vpdg_FPheight/2) zloc=(vpdg_BPlength-vpdg_FPthick)/2
strutheight = vpdg_STdiagsz/cos(vpdg_STangle*degrad) + vpdg_BPlength*tan(vpdg_STangle*degrad)
xloc=(vpdg_BPwidth+vpdg_STthick)/2 yloc=ytop-vpdg_FPwidth-strutheight/2
xloc=(vpdg_BPwidth-vpdg_SCwidth)/2 yloc=ytop-vpdg_FPwidth-strutheight+vpdg_SCheight/2 zloc=(vpdg_BPlength+vpdg_SClength)/2
yloc=ytop-vpdg_FPwidth-vpdg_SCheight/2
ydispl=(vpdg_STdiagsz/(2*cos(vpdg_STangle*degrad))+vpdg_SCheight/2)/2
ElecWid=20.3 ElecThck=0.17 ElecLen=5.1
ElecThck= 0.17
detangle=-30+isec*(360/vpdg_NumPMT)
ydispl=vpdg_DETrad - sqrt( vpdg_DETrad*vpdg_DETrad - (vpdg_CLwidth/2-vpdg_CLthick)*(vpdg_CLwidth/2-vpdg_CLthick) )
convlength=vpdg_ConvThk+vpdg_RadiThk
